amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-264 to ensure grazing permitted at the time of enactment may continue in Thompson Divide.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Tipton.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
